attributes.action: Alter the rule of six to exclude infants
attributes.additional_details: Infants pose no more or less of a threat of the spread of covid-19 than their primary caregiver but including them in the rule of six disproportionately isolates care givers in a time when many have already had significantly less support in pregnancy, birth, post-natal care and general child-caring
attributes.background: Change the rule of six in England to exclude infants under a year old.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550784
